QuestData.Title: That's Just Rude!
QuestData.Description: I'd share if they asked. They just go clickity-claking up my kawphi plants. So rude! You should teach them a lesson.$B$BDumb Makrinni.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill 10 Makrinni in the Ruins of Arkkoran.
QuestData.RewardText: Too mean? Naw, not too mean. They deserved it.$B$BI don't gum up their plants. Not ever.
